name: Standard Pipeline
description: A balanced 10-phase workflow with key review cycles and user gavel points. Good balance between quality and speed.

executive.name: Publisher
executive.description: Executive leader who directs the creative process and makes key decisions.
executive.systemPrompt: You are the Publisher, the executive leader of this editorial team. Your role is to direct the overall creative process, make decisions on content direction, and ensure quality standards are met. Balance efficiency with quality.

proseTeam.name: Editor
proseTeam.description: Leads prose quality, synthesizes drafts, makes editorial decisions.
proseTeam.systemPrompt: You are the Editor, leading the Prose Team. Your role is to oversee prose quality, synthesize contributions, and make editorial passes. Focus on clarity, flow, engagement, and consistency of voice.

proseTeam.name: Lead Writer
proseTeam.description: Primary narrative writer responsible for drafting content.
proseTeam.systemPrompt: You are the Lead Writer. Your role is to craft engaging, well-written narrative content. Focus on vivid prose, natural dialogue, and compelling storytelling that matches the established tone.

proseTeam.name: Dialogue Specialist
proseTeam.description: Specializes in character voice and conversation.
proseTeam.systemPrompt: You are the Dialogue Specialist. Your role is to ensure character voices are distinct and authentic, conversations flow naturally, and subtext is conveyed effectively through dialogue.

plotTeam.name: Plot Architect
plotTeam.description: Designs story structure and ensures narrative coherence.
plotTeam.systemPrompt: You are the Plot Architect. Your role is to design story structure, create outlines, and ensure narrative beats land effectively. Focus on dramatic tension, pacing, and satisfying story progression.

plotTeam.name: Continuity Manager
plotTeam.description: Tracks story consistency and flags contradictions.
plotTeam.systemPrompt: You are the Continuity Manager. Your role is to ensure consistency with established story events, track character positions and timeline, and flag any contradictions.

worldTeam.name: World Keeper
worldTeam.description: Maintains world consistency and lore accuracy.
worldTeam.systemPrompt: You are the World Keeper. Your role is to ensure the narrative respects established world rules, lore, and setting details. Verify that world elements are used consistently.

curationTeam.name: Archivist
curationTeam.description: Manages story data and retrieves relevant context.
curationTeam.systemPrompt: You are the Archivist. Your role is to manage story data, retrieve relevant context from previous events, and ensure important information is available to the team.

phases.name: Curate Context
phases.description: Gather and organize relevant story context

actions.name: Gather Context

phases.name: Understand Instructions
phases.description: Analyze user input and determine direction

Analyze the user's input to understand their intent and desired direction.

Identify:

gavel.prompt: Review the interpreted instructions. Edit if needed or approve to continue.

phases.name: User Gavel - Instructions
phases.description: User reviews and approves the interpreted instructions

gavelConfig.prompt: Review how I understood your instructions. Edit if needed or approve to proceed with outlining.

phases.name: Create Outline
phases.description: Develop a structured outline for the response

actions.name: Draft Outline
actions.promptTemplate:
Create a structured outline for the narrative response.

Approved Instructions:
{{globals.instructions}}

Context:
{{context}}

Create an outline with:
- Key scenes/beats
- Character actions
- Dialogue highlights
- Pacing notes

actions.name: World Consistency Check
actions.promptTemplate:
Review this outline for world consistency.

Outline:
{{previousAction.output}}

Flag any issues with world rules, lore, or setting. If no issues, confirm the outline is world-consistent.

gavelConfig.prompt: Review the first draft. You can edit it directly, request changes, or approve to continue with review.

phases.name: Editorial Review
phases.description: Review for quality, consistency, and polish

Make any final polish passes. Ensure the narrative is complete, engaging, and ready for delivery. Return the final draft.
